Rooms.Description: A large opening with flowers and a nearby lake
A small alcove with vines and overgrowth

Text.Text: You awaken in a large field surrounded by flowers and odd flora you don't recognize

Text.Name: Player
Text.Text: Uurgh, where am I
You're light headed and can't remember much.

Text.Name: Distant Voice
Text.Text: HEEEEEEYYY, YOU THERE!
You hear someone calling for you from a distance

Text.Name: Stranger
Text.Text: You lost pal, haven't seen your face before. You look injured, are you okay?
Asked the man that appears to be local...hunter, maybe, you aren't sure

Text.Name: Player
Text.Text: Uhh, yeah. I'm fine. Where..Where am I?

Text.Name: Man
Text.Text: Where are you? We're at [???] plains, near [town name]. You someplace to go? I can bring you to mu hut get some food

Text.Name: Player
Text.Text: Sure, that would be great, lead the way

Text.Name: Man
Text.Text: Alright then follow me
